title: Qwen, Evaluating LLMs and Our Next Steps
description: This episode features personal updates, including Avyay's move to London for a master's in data science, along with discussions on context, memory in AI models, evaluation challenges, and human oversight in development.
keyTakeaways: Qwen models represent significant advances in open-source LLMs.
Evaluating LLMs remains a challenging and evolving field.
Context and memory management are crucial for practical AI applications.
Human oversight remains essential in AI development workflows.
Continuous learning and adaptation are key in the fast-moving AI space.

showNotes.topic: Personal updates and Avyay's move to London
Context and memory in AI models
